definition: tiger stripes/tiger cub/(old) classifier for troops
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: There, you can make a quick phone call or see the Puma store.
sentences.chinese: 你可以快速撥號或進入彪馬商店。

sentences.english: Like stimulate people can join puma mast challenge.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡刺激的人們還可以參加彪馬桅杆挑戰。

sentences.english: Cherie Chung, one of Hongkong's hottest stars, did a TV commercial for Puma.
sentences.chinese: 香港紅星鐘楚紅替彪馬牌牛仔服做電視廣告。

sentences.english: It also rewards you, with the minutes being exchanged for Puma merchandise in the store.
sentences.chinese: 它還能告訴你在商店裏的彪馬產品的信息。

sentences.english: Every program is very Puma Phone-bright red, and stylised.
sentences.chinese: 每個項目都有彪馬手機的亮紅色和風格。

sentences.english: Puma said it would pull the products off shelves and recall them.
sentences.chinese: 彪馬方面稱，他們將下架並召回問題產品。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: see 殼牌公司|壳牌公司[Qiao4 pai2 gong1 si1]
